item.title: Zhipu AI GLM-4.5 Release: New Benchmark Challenging GPT-4's AI Coding Capabilities
item.description: Zhipu AI releases GLM-4.5 series models with 355B parameters, surpassing GPT-4.1 in SWE-bench tests, ranking 3rd globally in AI benchmarks, supporting code generation, PPT creation, and full-stack development capabilities.
